response.overview: Nima Abdul Ghaffar is a married woman who works as a simple employee in a company. She lives in a routine and boring life. In addition to working pressure, she meets a wealthy man who wants to buy the house through her husband Bassiouni. The rich woman begs her to divorce her husband to marry her. Leave it and abandon it and discover that he took the contract of customary marriage with him and decided to take revenge.
response.title: إمرأه فوق القمه
